name: Lantern Boy [GDKO R1 entry]
description:
This game is an entry to the 2023 GDKO game jam. The task was to create a level with a memorable location. Please play on Windows for best experience.

I have imagined a small riverside ghost town, where the player must guide ghosts to become the colours they've always wanted to be!

controls:

mouse left click  -  to move player

mouse right click  -  to move lantern

mouse scroll  -  to change lantern color

credits:

All the assets were created by Jimmy Lin

A shader was largely based off a tutorial by Nolkaloid

www.youtube.com/watch?v=32jdNLTJ3zY


Thank you and have fun!
